channel.title: Plans for World Domination
channel.description:
Post your plans of World Domination. I am sure you all have one.
Mine consists of poisoned bacon and mind control agents that lets me take control of the poisoned bacon.

item.title: Plans for World Domination
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
thomas_c:

The US only stays dominant until China says “We wish to wantonly collapse the entire world economy by forcing the most powerful country on the planet to default!”

fixed. t/n: not going to happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Plans for World Domination
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
Godless Prophet:

That, and whatever genes are involved in making boobs big and firm.

Your society is sounding more and more like a strip club.

Read full topic

item.title: Plans for World Domination
item.dc:creator: Godless_Prophet
item.description:
thomas_c:

Define “genetically superior”. Your average person of western Euroepean ancestry has no genes for sickle cell anemia. Good thing, right? Superior, even? Now, in western Afrika, sickle cell anemia is wide-spread. Bad thing, right? Nope. Sickle cell anemia makes you less susceptible to malaria.
I’ll laugh in your face when all your superior beings have been brought down by some new strain of the common cold that 80% of people just shrug off because of one little genetic “defect”

By “genetically superior” I mean those who will have the best traits for life in the society I would create. I would mostly focus on those who are the healthiest mentally, especially focusing on intelligence…

That, and whatever genes are involved in making boobs big and firm.

Read full topic

Define “genetically superior”. Your average person of western Euroepean ancestry has no genes for sickle cell anemia. Good thing, right? Superior, even? Now, in western Afrika, sickle cell anemia is wide-spread. Bad thing, right? Nope. Sickle cell anemia makes you less susceptible to malaria.

item.title: Plans for World Domination
item.dc:creator: Godless_Prophet
item.description:
[1] Gain a shiteton of grant money for various scientific experiments by creating a think tank and laboratory in the Antarctic Circle. It should be ready to preform experiments in every scientific field and have biomes with self sustaining versions of natural environments. The workers will be the most genetically superior humans available.
[2] Isolate the base’s population and get them all to look up to me as their leader; feed them negative information about the outside world until they all feel that most of humanity should be wiped out.
[3] Launch an array of satellites into orbit and claim they are for atmospheric research. Each satellite should be able to beam signals in the form of microwave radiation into the heads of world leaders. We will get them to star a nuclear war.
[4] As time progresses, we shall upgrade ourselves with advanced cyborg implants and offer those implants to any survivors willing to join. Those who resist shall be killed on sight.
[5] Under my rule, we will use the advanced technology created at the Antarctic base to restore the planet to permanently livable conditions, thus making me seem like a messiah.

Read full topic

item.title: Plans for World Domination
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
World domination is too hard. So much responsibility. The entire world looking to me for guidance and/or domination? Not for me. Imma retire to an island and let the world self-destruct.

Read full topic

item.title: Plans for World Domination
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
Shut down Americas economy permanently, therefore crippling world economy. Then shut down the internet, and blow up a few major landmarks (like The Great Wall of China) and launch nukes into the atmosphere, while I hide in my underground shelter. When the radiation is gone, I come up as one of few able people to rule. Or my children. Either way, I will install a monarchy society, with my family as the first Kings and Queens of New Earth.

Read full topic

item.title: Plans for World Domination
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Contract like-minded individuals in first-world nations all over the country. Give each a vehicle and a sniper rifle. So long as the world’s governments are not in compliance with my wishes, every day each contracted assassin kills one person, then flees to a randomly selected city in the ensuing fear and confusion to repeat the process the next day. Whenever my wishes are disobeyed, fear and paranoia grip the populace; riots rage rampant, countries shut down. Because the assassination is indiscriminate, any country that acts out of line is swiftly brought back in line by its peers. I speak through randomly selected individuals, leveraging them with threats on the lives of them and their loved ones, to maintain my anonymity. In the event that I am captured, I self-terminate, and another of the individuals takes control, contracting another like-minded assassin to take his place.

Read full topic
